name: Button Dungeon
description:
Welcome to the button dungeon! Your movements are limited, since energy is scarce. Try not to run out of controls to use! Every button counts.

Controls: 

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to use orbs
  • X to break boxes using kicks

WARNING: Due to messing up with builds the game cannot be finished for now. Checking with organizers. In case I don't get lucky and there are still bugs open, I will release a bug-free version without NO new content here: https://maesk.itch.io/button-dungeon-postjam Please remember that this is not allowed by the jam purposes but for you to at least enjoy it a bit more.

(Somehow I was able to rush this through after starting on Sunday!)
